ygData.subject: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been saving my training points from the beginning.I have around 85 points to use. I can understand learning other languages from other races but what
ygData.messageBody:
I have been saving my training points from the beginning.I have around 85 points to use. I can understand learning other languages from other races but what about Elder Ter'Dal<sp>, Elder Giant, Orcish, Fairy, and quite a few other languages that aren't used buy one of the major races that you can talk to. I have heard the first Wizard book is in Old Erudian. If this is true I will put some of my points into it if no one knows how to learn it normally. As far as runes are concerned I believe most of them are random. I have got them off your average non-named NPCs. Some runes for some of the higher level spells need to be taken off a specific NPC from what variant has said about higher level spells.

Thanks

Garrland BlazeStormer
21th Level Wizard
